5D72A470.Line1.EDC7F: Should’ve cut and run when I had the chance. Like the others did. The smart ones. Everything they said about Kemir is true. Mad as a viper.

915B9774.Line5.EDC7F: Should’ve cut and run when I had the chance.

CC7C0A9D.VoiceDir1.EDC7F: Desperate. Anxious. A touch angry with himself.

F7671DF2.Line3.EDC7F: Why did I follow her into this damn mine? She wants to die here. Said it herself. A glorious last stand. And still I went along with it like a whipped dog.
